review: Works great, I love it.  I love Amazon, so it was a relatively easy decision to invest in this product.  I get Netflix DVDs but not streaming - Amazon's Prime is a better deal.  With my electronic gear, I had to use a set of Monster Powernet adaptors to get my DVD player & TV hooked to the Internet.  One day they stopped working, and that's when I bought the Amazon Fire TV.  A lot less fuss than the adaptors, which are now gathering dust.  If you like Amazon, becoming a Prime member and buying this gadget will put a lot more entertainment on your TV.
author: Stonehedger

review: This could get a 5 star rating except for the fact that I can be watching a show and it freezes or blacks out.  I get a message stating that it can't play this show right now and check back later.  I then have to go into settings, clear data, unplug that unit for 20 seconds then turn it back on to get it to work properly again.  I learned that trick from other user's who experience the same thing.  I would not recommend you purchase this unit until Amazon addresses this issue.
